data.text: Hiwa thengnga, Jisu'n Jerusalemma Jihudi ngai kahoi sik-ah aleisi.
Jerusalemma Keelngam Kot koolla pham ra-nga-ah inmakhu tuikuong inkhat aleiom; Hebrew ngai chongnga Bethzatha inti.5:2. Keelngam kot koolla ... tuikuong; emakli keelngam kot koolla ... amun.
Amit kacho, keii kakiak, apum kathi khat-um akana katam tak-in tuikuong luutna lamma inleizaal.

Inmani'n tui innik kha inleingaak, ajarchu tui innikna racham Pumi tirton in tuikuong suungnga aluut-ah khat-um tui kha aleikachok. Tui hongkachoksuo nuk-ah tuikuong suungnga kaluut masa akana mi kha ileiroontak rirai makheiya aleidam.
Kum soomthum leiriat kanajei miring inkhat aleiom.
Jisu'n ama kha khawakhan azaalla ileiom kha aleimu, khat-um khawa miring pakha anana hongsoot theijei tihi ama'n aleijet phakhan Jisu'n “Nang nadam zootbo?” tia amadiang aleirakel.
Akanapa khan Jisu diang aleimasang, “Karu, tui hong innik phakhan tuikuongnga kanaruoisik tuteii ommu; kei'n chumnasik kaheitho phakhan, miring khat-in naluutdel masa.”
Jisu'n ama diang aleiti, “Intheiro, napher kha ruut-inlang, halli siro.”
Khawapha takkhan mipa kha aleidam; apher kha aruut-ah aleisi.
Jihudi lamkakei ngai'n akadamjei mipadiang inleiti, “Sabbath eii, eini Sinadan dungkajuiya nang in napher niraput kha dan akoi.” Neh 13:9; Jer 17:21
Takkha ama'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Kei kanamindam mipa'n kapher ruut-inlang siro analeiti.”
Inmani'n amadiang inleirakel, “Nangdiang napher ruut-inlang siro kanaleiti miring kha tume?”
Takkha akadamjei mipa khan ama kha tume leijetmak, ajarchu Jisu'n aleisuok deljei, khat-um khawa munkhan mipui katamtak inleiom.

Khawa thengnga, Jisu'n mipa kha Biak-inn khan intongpuiya ama diang aleiti, “Enro, tuun nang nadamjei; kheella nachungnga kathamak suokmaknasik, manu thokhaimaro, emak inchu katha makthei nangdiang suokthei eii.”
Halli mipa khan asiya kei kanamindam pakha Jisu eii tia ma'n Jihudi chuonkaroon ngaidiang ajuorilsuok.
Jisu'n Sabbath nikhuoni hiwa chuon atho jarra Jihudi ngai'n Jisu kha poong-raalna inleipeii.
Takkha Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Kapa khan tuunkatuung chuon thocheiya om, halli kei-um chuon kitho eii.”

Hiwa chong jarra Jihudi chuonkaroon ngai'n Jisu kha kheella thatna sik-ah inlei entok; ajarchu Sabbath imakoi khabit emak-ah, takkha Pathian kha apa eii tia ama'n aleiti, apum takkha Pathian le in-angpui.
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kanati: Asapa khan iteii-um atheinuoa thomatormak, Apa itho imu ngaikhabit ama'n atho; Apa itho kha, Asapa innum itho eii.
Ajarchu Apa khan Asapa kha aminriang halli apum tak-in itho ngai rakip kha Asapa diang aminmu, nangni'n ningngak domnasik hineek-ah kalok thonasik-ah amadiang alaminmusik eii.
Apa khan akathi ngai aminringnga ringkhuo ipenook angnga, Asapa innum ipezoot mi ngaidiang ringna apeii.
Apa khan tuteii diang-um chong tanmak, takkha Asapa diang chongtan nasik ranak rakip ama'n apejei,
Apa diang khoya intho angnga mi rakip in Asapa kha khoya inthosik eii. Asapa khoya kathomak ama khan Asapa kajuotir Apa kha-um khoya kathomak eii.

“Kei'n inthiangnga nangnidiang kati: Kei kachong karangai khat-um kei kanajuotir amadiang inngamna mi khan kumsoot ringna anei, ama chungnga chongtan omnuni, takkha kathiya inphut ringna kha inrakaanjei.
Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kati: akathi ngai'n Pathian Sapa rasa kha injet nasik, halli akajet ngai'n inhongring nasik-ah aphakha aheiwasik eii, halli tuun aphakha ejei.
Apa'n ringna inei angnga, Ama'n Asapa diang-um apum tak-ah ringna aneinasik azootpi.
Khat-um Ama'n Asapa diang chongtan nasik ranak apejei, ajarchu amahi Miring Sapa kha eii.
Hiwa hin nangni ngakmaru; Akathi mi rakip in thaankhur makheiya ama rasa injet nasik apha kha ajuojei
Halli akatha katho ngai'n inthaan makheiya hongsuok inta ringna inneisik eii, halli kathamak katho ngai'n chongtan nasik-ah inhongringsik eii.” Dan 12:2

“Kei karanak-ah iteii thomatormong; Pathian in chong tanro iti-ngai bitkha Kei'n chong katan, halli kei chongtanhi adik, ajarchu kei imanuom kha kei thosik ngaidonmong, takkha kei kanajuotir ama imanuom kha katho.
Kei kapum taksik sakhi kape inchu, Kei sakhi hi dikmak;
Takkha mi inkhat kei sakhi ka-e om, halli kei'n kajet khachu ama'n kei jarra iril ngaikha adik.
Nangni'n John diang ningheitir, halli John in inmanidiang akadik kha aleirilpi. Jn 1:19-27; 3:27-30
Kei'n mi ngai sakhi kilei emak, takkha Kei'n hiwa katina ajarchu nangni'n ringna ningmunasik eii.
John hi war kanapeii sariakmei kakai kha alei eii, halli nangni'n ama warkhan apha bongkhat hoinasik-ah ningkadang.
Takkha kei ipeii sakhi hichu John ta neek-ah kalok eii; kei thosik-ah Kapa inapeii chuon ngai, khat-um kei itho chuon ngai khan keihi Apa inajuotir eii tia amalar.”
Halli kei kanajuotir kapa in kei jarra sakhi apeii. Nangni'n ama rasa woikhat-um lajetmakchu khat-um ama meel lamumakchu, Matt 3:17; Mk 1:11; Luk 3:12
halli nangni'n ama chongkha ningmalungnga reiimakchu, ajarchu ama ijuotir miringkha ngamnamakchu.
Nangni'n Chong inthiang kha ning-entok, ajarchu nangni'n khawa khan hektik kaboi ringna kinmu eii ningti; halli khawa Pathian chong kha eii, kei jarra sakhi ka-eii;
kha e-innum nangni'n ringna ningmunasik keidiang heiwazoot makchu.
“Manmasi ngai'n naminpaak kha kei manuommong,
takkha kei'n kajet, khachu nangni ningmalung suungnga Pathian minriang nakha neimakchu.
Kei'n Kapa ramingnga kajuo, halli nangni'n kei nazootmakchu; takkha miringkhat apumtak thomatorna ramingnga ajuo-inchu, nangni'n ama chu ningdonsik eii.
Pathian diangnga kajuo minpaak nakha entoklekleiya inkhatli inkhat inpaak kha ningmanuom inle angtho tholi ngamna ningneisik me?
Kei'n Kapa maikuungnga nangni kanaril sesik eii tia ngaidonmaru. Nangni'n ngamna ningnei Moses kha-eii nangni kanaril sesik.
Nangni'n Moses kha inthiangnga ningleingamna inchu, nangni'n kei-um ningna ngamnasik eii, ajarchu Moses in kei jarra aleimajia.
Takkha ama ileimajia kha ningngamnamak inchu, angtho tholi kei kachong ningngamnasik me?”
